@title Proxy
@dev Gives the possibility to delegate any call to a foreign implementation.
nodes.name: Proxy
getContractdAddress

nodes.documentation:
@dev Fallback function allowing to perform a delegatecall to the given implementation.
This function will return whatever the implementation call returns

getContractdAddress

nodes.documentation:
@dev Fallback function allowing to perform a delegatecall to the given implementation.
This function will return whatever the implementation call returns

devdoc.details: Gives the possibility to delegate any call to a foreign implementation.

getContractdAddress().details: Tells the address of the implementation where every call will be delegated.
getContractdAddress().return: address of the implementation to which it will be delegated

devdoc.title: Proxy

getContractdAddress().notice: THE IMPLEMENT THIS IN ORDER TO AVOID UNDEFINDED WHEN FALLBACK FUNCTION CALL IT FROM PARRENT CONTRACT
